verbs.description: [ARG0: Attorneys general from 20 states and the Washington , D.C. ,] [V: wrote] [ARG1: a letter] [ARG2: to Attorney General Jeff Sessions and Homeland Security Secretary Kirstjen Nielsen] , [C-ARG1: opposing the Trump administration 's " zero tolerance " stance on immigration] .

[ARG0: Attorneys general from 20 states and the Washington , D.C. ,] wrote a letter to Attorney General Jeff Sessions and Homeland Security Secretary Kirstjen Nielsen , [V: opposing] [ARG1: the Trump administration 's " zero tolerance " stance on immigration] .
